title.0: Ja Mur Ja Aje Vi Ghar Mur Ja
title.1: Turn away! Still you can turn away to your home!

commentary: A warning to the wayfarer: Stay away from love!
footnotes: [1] Heer is the female protagonist from Punjabi folk love story Heer-Ranjha.
[2] Ali is one of the central figures of Shia Islam.
[3] Muhammad is the prophet of Islam.
[4] Fatima is one of Muhammad's daughters.
[5] Reference to Punjabi folk love story Sohni-Mahiwal.
[6] Sohni is the female protagonist from Punjabi folk love story Sohni-Mahiwal.
[7] Reference to Punjabi folk love story Sassi-Punhun.
[8] In the story Sohni-Mahiwal, Sohni drowns in the river Chenab trying to reach Mahiwal.
[9] In the story Sassi-Punhun, Sassi dies of heat exhaustion in the desert trying to reach Punhun.

lyrics.0: ishq de mehkame gaya main ik din
lyrics.1: One day, I went to the house of love.

lyrics.0: aggo ishq ne meri badeyayi thag layi
lyrics.1: But instead, love stole my good virtue!

lyrics.0: main te gaya saan ishq ton daad lehne
lyrics.1: I had gone there simply to appreciate what love was.

lyrics.0: aggon ishq ne meri dunayi thag layi
lyrics.1: But instead, love robbed me of my holiness!

lyrics.0: es ishq ne bade bade thag laye karu baadshah di baadshsahi thag layi
lyrics.1: This love has stolen from wise people of the past - love even stole the kingship from King Karu!

lyrics.0: tain ki thageya ashq daara es ishq ne khuda di khudayi thag kayi
lyrics.1: What love has stolen from me is nothing in comparison - love stole Godliness from God!

lyrics.0: yaari ishq de naal na laa baithin eh yaar bana ke lut lainda
lyrics.1: Don't befriend love, it seems friendly at first, but then it steals from you!

lyrics.0: eh ishq awalra daku eh bas nain mila ke lut lainda
lyrics.1: This love is a unique robber, with just its eyes it can steal from you!

lyrics.0: eh ishq vi awala ehde kam vi awale
lyrics.1: This love is unique, it's workings and ways are unique also.

lyrics.0: jihde pesh pe janda khak chadtha nahi pale
lyrics.1: Whomever it goes after, it leaves nothing in that poor person's possession.

lyrics.0: ja mur ja aje vi ghar mur ja ni ishq ch ki rakheya
lyrics.1: Turn away! Still you can turn away to your home! What do you expect to find in love?

lyrics.0: ishq diyan ne hazoor badiyan manzilan ne door
lyrics.1: Listen respected person, the destination of love is still far away.

lyrics.0: ehne dube lakhan poor eh nahi vekhda kasoor
lyrics.1: It has sunk many innocent people, it doesn't consider your guilt or innocence.

lyrics.0: phad ke khal khich lehnda eh khayaal rakh layin
lyrics.1: It will grab you and skin you alive - keep that in your mind!

lyrics.0: eh joban nahi labhna lakhi vela gaya na aaunda hathi
lyrics.1: Your youth will never come back; and the present is slipping from your hands!

lyrics.0: ishq tatteh nu door hi rakhi rul na jaawin kidre kakhi
lyrics.1: Keep this heat of love far from you, don't become destitute and pitiful!

lyrics.0: pal vich neetiyan jawan akhi heer de waangar zehar na vakhi
lyrics.1: In moments, your eyes will be stolen! Like Heer[1] don't drink this poison!

lyrics.0: ja mur ja aje vi ghar mur ja ni ishq ch ki rakheya
lyrics.1: Turn away! Still you can turn away to your home! What do you expect to find in love?

lyrics.0: ishq di reet hai sare jag tu jud na eh rah dekhda na khura dhekhda
lyrics.1: The way of love is different from the rest of the world - it doesn't look for well trodden paths.

lyrics.0: ishq layi da halde khuli ek sar ha na eh shah dekhda na ghada dehkda
lyrics.1: For love, the mansion and hut are the same - it doesn't differentiate between king and beggar.

lyrics.0: ghar ali da hove ja mohammad da ghar fatima da hove chahe lakh de jigar
lyrics.1: Whether it be Ali's[2] house, or Muhammad's[3] house, whether Fatima's[4] or a beloved friend's.

lyrics.0: jithe ji chave chakaunda ashq da sar khana kaaba te na karbala dhekha
lyrics.1: Wherever love wishes, there it bows the head of the lover - it doesn't distinguish between the house and the holy place.

lyrics.0: maut ishq nu kithe eh maut nu vi far maut di neend suna chadtha
lyrics.1: What is death to love? It can grab death, and make death itself sleep the sleep of death!

lyrics.0: cherhi tasdi di vich ja varda othe a ishq ujjare pa chadtha
lyrics.1: That body which love enters - it leaves it ruined!

lyrics.0: ja mur ja aje vi ghar mur ja ni ishq ch ki rakheya
lyrics.1: Turn away! Still you can turn away to your home! What do you expect to find in love?

lyrics.0: pair aggan wal dharna payega kache ghare te tarna payega
lyrics.1: You will have to step forward - you will have to float with just an unfinished pot[5]!

lyrics.0: dard vi mitha zarna payega apne aap toh darna payega
lyrics.1: Even sweet pain you will have to endure - you will have to become afraid of yourself!

lyrics.0: baazi jit ke harna payega sohni waanga marna payega
lyrics.1: After winning the gamble, you will have to lose anyway! You will have to die like Sohni[6]!

lyrics.0: ja mur ja aje vi ghar mur ja ni ishq ch ki rakheya
lyrics.1: Turn away! Still you can turn away to your home! What do you expect to find in love?

lyrics.0: sassi wangar tapdi rahengi punhun punhun japdi rahengi
lyrics.1: Like Sassi you will burn up! You will keep chanting 'Punhun', 'Punhun'[7]!

lyrics.0: agg ishq di nappdi rahengi maru thal vich thapdi rahengi
lyrics.1: You will keep trying to contain the heat of love - in the desert you will keep burning!

lyrics.0: tor je turdi sapp di rahengi vich kitaaban chapdi rahengi
lyrics.1: You will keep crawling like a snake - for all time, you will keep getting published in love stories!

lyrics.0: ja mur ja aje vi ghar mur ja ni ishq ch ki rakheya
lyrics.1: Turn away! Still you can turn away to your home! What do you expect to find in love?

lyrics.0: pehle soch lai eh ishq lakoya vi nahi jaana
lyrics.1: First contemplate this - you will not even be able to hide love.

lyrics.0: pher bhajna te ki e khaloya vi nahi jaana
lyrics.1: Then, forget about running, you won't even be able to stand still!

lyrics.0: ja mur ja aje vi ghar mur ja ni ishq ch ki rakheya
lyrics.1: Turn away! Still you can turn away to your home! What do you expect to find in love?

lyrics.0: je tain ishq gal pauna saah sukh da nahi auna
lyrics.1: If you embrace love - you will never breathe easily again!

lyrics.0: paina kandeya te sauna rona umaran nu rona
lyrics.1: You will have to sleep on thorns! You will cry for many lifetimes, in just one lifetime!

lyrics.0: ehthe sir dena painda eh khayaal rakh layi
lyrics.1: When in love, you must cut off your own head - keep that in mind.

lyrics.0: ja mur ja aje vi ghar mur ja ni ishq ch ki rakheya
lyrics.1: Turn away! Still you can turn away to your home! What do you expect to find in love?

lyrics.0: ishq de naal naal na aada laawin
lyrics.1: Don't take refuge in love!

lyrics.0: dil athre nu bai samjhaawin
lyrics.1: Sit down and explain this to your rebellious heart!

lyrics.0: 'bari' de waangar na pachchtaawin
lyrics.1: Like the poet 'Bari', don't make a decision that you will regret!

lyrics.0: beleyan de vich pair na paawin
lyrics.1: Don't set foot into the congregation of lovers!

lyrics.0: vich chenab na gote khaawin
lyrics.1: Don't drown in the Chenab[8] river!

lyrics.0: maru thal vich sarh na jaawin
lyrics.1: Don't burn to death in the desert[9]!

lyrics.0: ja mur ja aje vi ghar mur ja ni ishq ch ki rakheya
lyrics.1: Turn away! Still you can turn away to your home! What do you expect to find in love?
